events.message: I received my order yesterday but the laptop screen has several cracks and scratches that weren’t mentioned in the description.
The issue has been identified as a product defect due to the reported broken and scratched laptop screen.
Your case has been assigned to one of our technical support agents for further assistance.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your laptop screen. I’m here to help resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the damaged screen and let us know if the packaging was also damaged upon arrival?
I’ve attached pictures showing the cracks and scratches on the screen. The box looked slightly dented but the damage seemed mostly on the laptop.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a replacement unit or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement if possible, as I still want to use this model.
We have processed the replacement order for your laptop and it should be shipped within 2 business days. You will receive tracking details soon.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement laptop and that everything is in perfect condition. Please let us know if you need any more help.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and the screen is flawless this time. Thank you for the swift support!
We’re glad everything is resolved. Closing your case now, but do reach out if you have any other questions or concerns.
